overview:
Co-Founder and eMarketing Tigress of South Africa-based Prothemer CMS themes club.

Tess is a location independent Swedish expatriate with a background in coaching and HR, uniquely mixed with technology and eMarketing. She works with “people, development and technology in one beautiful mix” and is currently handling all emarketing for Cape Town based Prothemer and its sister company, JoomlaJunkie.

Together with the Prothemer/Joomlajunkie team Tess also runs InspireChange.nu - an initiative to inspire positive change on a global level, online and offline.
